product_name: Sanuk Yoga Sling Flip-Flops - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Sanuk Yoga Sling Flip-Flops for women bring a stylish new twist to the casual flip-flop. They feature lightweight stretch sling uppers for a feminine, fun fit. Stretch polyester-knit "sling" on each sandal wraps around the ankles and over the instep for a secure fit. Footbeds are made from real yoga mats with a sealed edge and stitch detail. Happy U sponge-rubber outsoles cushion and grip. All-synthetic construction on the Sanuk Yoga Sling flip-flops makes them vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Sanuk Yoga Sling Flip-Flops for women bring a stylish new twist to the casual flip-flop. They feature lightweight stretch sling uppers for a feminine, fun fit.
